column2: This is the government of Gods. The only real rulers are the Gods. Humanity is futile.
Bring darkness into the heart of a god.
Bring light into the heart of a god.
Make this god immuned to the influences of evil.
Make this god immuned to the influences of good.
Grants god immunity from all evil influences.
Revokes god's immunity from all evil influences.
Grants god immunity from all good influences.
Revokes god's immunity from all good influences.
